result.eng: Máire, dear, what is wrong with you?
result.ga: A Mháire a stóir cad atá ort
result.orig: A Mháire a stóir cad atá ort
result.html: A Mháire a stóir cad atá ortMáire, dear, what is wrong with you?
result.ponchtml: A Ṁáire a stóir cad atá ortMáire, dear, what is wrong with you?

result.eng: What is wrong with your left foot?
result.ga: Cad atá cearr leis an chos chlé agat
result.orig: Cad atá cearr leis an chos chlé agat
result.html: Cad atá cearr leis an chos chlé agatWhat is wrong with your left foot?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá cearr leis an ċos ċlé agatWhat is wrong with your left foot?

result.html: Thug tú an freagra mícheartYou gave the wrong answer.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug tú an freagra míċeartYou gave the wrong answer.

result.eng: What's wrong with you? - A cold, I think.
result.html: Cad atá ort - Slaghdán sílimWhat's wrong with you? - A cold, I think.
result.ponchtml: Cad atá ort - Slaġdán sílimWhat's wrong with you? - A cold, I think.

result.eng: There is something wrong with this car.
result.ga: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seo
result.orig: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seo
result.html: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seoThere is something wrong with this car.
result.ponchtml: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an ċarr seoThere is something wrong with this car.

result.html: Céard atá ortWhat is [wrong] with you?
result.ponchtml: Céard atá ortWhat is [wrong] with you?

result.eng: "What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ga: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.orig: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.html: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ponchtml: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a ċaiṫ Rebekka an baḃla isteaċ sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.

result.eng: The theory is wrong, according to the experts.
result.ga: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaithe
result.orig: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaithe
result.html: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaitheThe theory is wrong, according to the experts.
